paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for the TTR gene, including penetrance data.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Four TTR-positive patients had disease onset before 40 years: 15 and 31 years with c.148G>A (p.Val50Met).
Four TTR-positive patients had disease onset before 40 years: 15 and 31 years with c.148G>A (p.Val50Met).

functional_data.summary: The variant is associated with hereditary transthyretin-related amyloidosis.

variants.evidence_level: Strong evidence based on clinical correlation.
variants.additional_notes: The variant is one of the most frequent in the study.
key_quotes: The most prevalent variant associated with amyloid PNP is NM_000371.3:c.148G>A (p.Val50Met).
Four TTR-positive patients had disease onset before 40 years: 15 and 31 years with c.148G>A (p.Val50Met).

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Four TTR-positive patients had disease onset before 40 years: 30 years with c.424G>A (p.Val142Ile).

functional_data.summary: The variant is associated with hereditary transthyretin-related amyloidosis.

variants.evidence_level: Strong evidence based on clinical correlation.
variants.additional_notes: The variant is one of the most frequent in the study.
key_quotes: The most common variant involved in the cardiac form of hATTR is NM_000371.3:c.424G>A (p.Val142Ile).
Four TTR-positive patients had disease onset before 40 years: 30 years with c.424G>A (p.Val142Ile).

tables_processed.table_caption: TTR heterozygous variants in patients with PNP and/or CM.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data was extracted from the main text and tables.
